summary: This is a U.S. Department of Justice Request for Financial Information under the Right to Financial Privacy Act (RFPA), specifically a purchase order and receiving report directed to Citibank, N.A. It is associated with USA number 2018R01059, indicating it is part of a financial investigation, likely related to the Epstein case, seeking records from individual and small partnership accounts.

events.title: RFPA Request Issued to Citibank
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office issued a Request for Financial Information under the Right to Financial Privacy Act to Citibank, N.A., seeking financial records.

events.title: Receiving Report Signed
events.description: The receiving report for the financial information request was signed, indicating processing or receipt of records.

locations: San Antonio, TX (Citibank location: 100 Citibank Dr., Bldg.1, Fl.2)
keyFacts: The document is a formal U.S. Department of Justice request for financial records from Citibank under the Right to Financial Privacy Act (RFPA).
It is associated with USA number 2018R01059, indicating it is part of an ongoing federal investigation, likely related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The request targets records of individuals and partnerships of five or fewer individuals, not corporate accounts.
The document includes detailed cost estimates for processing the request, including search, reproduction, and media storage fees.
The receiving report was signed on September 3, 2019, confirming the action on the request initiated on August 19, 2019.
